definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Such is Golding's sense of human condition.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些都是戈爾丁對人類境況的悲劇性意識。

sentences.english: I thought it was a tragic mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這是一個悲劇性的錯誤。

sentences.english: Japan’s emperor Hirohito tragically vacillated over the war.
sentences.chinese: 日本天皇裕仁對戰爭的優柔寡斷是悲劇性的。

sentences.english: Because of this wrong choice, Pound's tragical fate was inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 由於這一錯誤的選擇，龐德的悲劇性命運無法避免。

sentences.english: Butthere is anything un-tragic in the early Christian spirit.
sentences.chinese: 但是，早期基督教精神裏也有非悲劇性的東西。

sentences.english: Chapter Five is an analysis of the tragic consequences of loss of faith among the Tyrones.
sentences.chinese: 第五章分析蒂龍一家信仰喪失的悲劇性後果。

sentences.english: But the fragility of world food markets has been underscored by the tragic events of this summer.
sentences.chinese: 但今夏一些悲劇性事件更突顯了脆弱的世界糧食市場。

sentences.english: The tragic result was the CIA failed to catch the message.
sentences.chinese: 悲劇性的結果就是中情局沒有注意到這條信息。

sentences.english: System background aggravate literature their destiny tragic.
sentences.chinese: 體制化背景加劇了其文學命運的悲劇性。

sentences.english: It also aims Goulding tragic irony of this novel.
sentences.chinese: 戈爾丁打算作爲一個悲劇性的諷刺的這本小說。

sentences.english: On one it is an exciting but tragic adventure story.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，這是一個激動人心的帶有悲劇性的冒險故事。

sentences.english: Thus this dreamland just foreshadows the tragic end of Catherine's love.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這個夢境正好預示了凱瑟琳愛情的悲劇性結尾。

sentences.english: This explains the tragedy of Macbeth, whose obvious "evilness" puts him in sharp contras…
sentences.chinese: 這就解釋了麥克白作爲一個反面人物的悲劇性。

sentences.english: It tells no tales of tragic kisses and metamorphoses .
sentences.chinese: 它沒吐露悲劇性的熱吻與變形的故事。

sentences.english: But between them the common ground lies in the tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 而他們之間的共同點在於“愚忠”與悲劇性。
